description.value: A pattern profile unifying the common content of the different profiles for the score zibs.

purpose.value:
The different score zibs like ApgarScore, ComfortScale, FLACCpainScale, MUSTScore and StrongKidsStore are modelled in a highly similar way and, as a result, are profiled a highly similar way in FHIR. This pattern profile is created to abstract the boiler plate content away from these zib profiles.
It should be noted that this is an "ad-hoc" collection of common content. The fact that a common base profile exists DOES NOT imply that score zibs are based on the same functional model and DOES NOT guarantee that all score zibs or score profiles will follow this approach.

comment.value: The individual scores are communicated using the different `Observation.component` slices. The ordinal values of these indivdual scores, which are used to calculate the total score, are defined by the underlying code system and are registered in the bound ValueSet resources using the [ordinalValue](http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ordinalValue) extension.

These `Observation.component` slices contain the individual scores which make up the total score. The ordinal values of these indivdual scores are defined by the underlying code system and are registered in the bound ValueSet resources using the [ordinalValue](http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ordinalValue) extension.
